credentials: PHD 2019 Univ of Texas at Arlington
name: Juliet HUYNH

ratings.comment: I didn't see the option for English 316 but that was the class I took. Professor Huynh is a great professor and is really helpful and caring. There are so many opportunities for extra credit and to bump up your grade. The projects were actually kind of fun and you learn a lot about different dialects in the U.S. I'm glad I took the class.

Juliet is one of the best professors I have ever taken at UW-Madison. She is extremely well-versed in lecture material & content, and she teaches with both kindness and passion. The class itself is rather challenging, but Juliet ensured that each of us were able to understand exactly what was going on. I 100/10 recommend taking a class with her!

E314 is cool and great. I took it for the TESOL cert. Juliet and a phenomenal instructor. Explains topics clearly and passionately. I went to a couple TA meetings, she made sure I fully understood the lecture material, answered my questions completely and fully, and praised my understanding of it. I highly recommend this class and the instructor.

Professor Huynh is very caring and responsive. She genuinely cares for her students and wants them to succeed. Her lectures are a little boring and monotone but she is very optimistic and her material is interesting. She's a first year professor, so I give her a lot of credit for doing so well.
